summary: This email correspondence involves Andrew Tomback discussing a potential misrepresentation regarding his relationship with Jeffrey Epstein. Tomback expresses concern over an agent's testimony that inaccurately claims he was Epstein's attorney, which he denies, and seeks clarification on the matter.

persons.name: Andrew Tomback
persons.context: Andrew Tomback is discussing a potential misrepresentation of his role in relation to Jeffrey Epstein, asserting that he never represented Epstein.

persons.name: Richard Kahn
persons.context: Richard Kahn is mentioned as a client that Andrew Tomback represented, indicating a professional relationship.

persons.name: Drew Tomback
persons.context: Drew Tomback is the sender of the forwarded email, which includes a link to an article about Jeffrey Epstein.

connections.description: Andrew Tomback represented Richard Kahn in a legal matter.

keyFacts: Andrew Tomback claims he never met nor represented Jeffrey Epstein.
Tomback is concerned about an agent's testimony that inaccurately states he was Epstein's attorney.
Tomback represented Richard Kahn, not Epstein.
The email discusses a potential correction to a news article regarding Epstein.
Drew Tomback forwarded an article link about Jeffrey Epstein's Manhattan residence.
